lead_paragraph: Mr. Musk, the billionaire founder of SpaceX, hopes to make humanity a “multiplanetary species.”

headline.print_headline: Billionaire Unveils Plan to Take Humans to Mars as Early as 2024
headline.main: Elon Musk’s Plan: Get Humans to Mars, and Beyond

snippet: Mr. Musk, the billionaire founder of SpaceX, hopes to make humanity a “multiplanetary species.”...
abstract: SpaceX founder Elon Musk unveils details of plan to take humans to Mars as early as 2024 with aim of establishing self-sustaining colony on planet; estimates cost of first rocket at $10 billion.
